strong.span: All Lakewood Public Schools Are Closed Until Further Notice

div.strong: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention Videos

div.p: Superintendent of Schools, Mrs. Laura A. Winters - lwinters@lakewoodpiners.org
Office of General Counsel, Michael I. Inzelbuch, Esq. - michael@inzelbuchlaw.com
Comcast Offering FREE WiFi - to locate a hotspot: www.xfinity.com/wifi
Hackensack Meridian Health Ocean Medical Center (Brick Hospital) - 732-840-2200
Monmouth and Ocean County Food Bank (fulfill) - 732-918-2600

ol.li: Carrier Clinic www.carrierclinic.org 1-800-933-3579 Crisis Intervention Services Specialized inpatient crisis stabilization services for adolescents.

Children's Mobile Response and Stabilization System http://www.performcarenj.org/families/emergency-services.aspx 1-877-652-7624 Provides time limited, crisis intervention and stabilization services to children and youth with emotional or behavioral disturbances that threaten to disrupt their current living arrangements.

Ocean Mental Health Services www.oceanmhs.org 732-575-1111 or 1-877-621-0445 Ocean CREST program, an Early Intervention Support Services program which is an alternative to the Psychiatric Emergency Screening Services, for those who will not be requiring hospitalization and after provides needed crisis intervention services and connects with ongoing community based support services.
Contact of Ocean County https://contactoceanmonmouth.org 732-2406100 or 609-693-5834 24 hour crisis hotline.
National Hope Hotline https://poconoinfo.communityos.org/zf/profile/program/id/48131 1-800-442-4673 Referrals and interventions.
St. Francis Counseling Center www.stfranciscenterlbi.org 609-494-8861 Counseling and Referral Services
St. Barnabas Behavioral Health www.barnabashealth.org 732-914-1688 Provides crisis intervention services.
Psychiatric Emergency screening Services (PESS) www.kmc.org 732-886-4474 Screening assessments, crisis intervention to victims and people experiencing traumatic events.
Preferred Behavioral Health of NJ www.preferredbehavioral.org 732-458-1700 Counseling available.
2NDFLOOR www.2ndfloor.org Call or text 888-222-2228 Youth Crisis Helpline
